info.name: Room Booking Services - V2
info.description: This collection will contain V2 services of Room Booking Services APIs

item.name: Availability Calendar V2 tests

exec: pm.expect(responseText).to.include("Required source attribute is empty or invalid");
pm.expect(responseText).to.include("No property id or invalid property id to retrieve prices");

item.name: Partial program - Exclude non offer dates

item.description: All the Availability Calendar related integration test cases will be kept here.
